titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, Political Agent, to James Dow, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing a further letter from Captain R Warto, Paymaster at Kishma [Qeshm] to Dow, dated 3 November 1820. In his letter, Warto requests Dow's assistance in the raising of 50,000 rupees for the payment of British troops in the Persian Gulf.
